name: Scrappy (danikiedis)
description:
Scrappy was developed in Unity engine for the Brackeys-4 game jam. 
Unfortunately, the final build could not be finished on time. We have uploaded a very simplified version of the game.

Single-player 2.5D game for Windows, playable with  Xbox controller or keyboard.
Theme: REWIND

When humans dispatched all scrap and obsolete tech up to space, they thought they were just dumping all that junk there to lay dead for eternity.
...boy, were they wrong. 
Scrappy just wants to keep on harvesting some useful parts to enjoy the rest of its lifespan peacefully. Too bad that are other robots willing to take control of all the best resources, turning the junkyard into a dangerous and constantly guarded zone. 
Scrappy can't do much more than run and fight the gangsters, but its powers are too limited to confront their mighty leader. Scrappy wonders if one day, things will go back to how they were before the gang took over...

Team:

Bianca Sartoretto - 2D artist
Cedrik Rocha - Game Designer
Daniela Reigas - Producer, Writer
nan0.core (João Silva) - 3D Artist
Patrick Machado - Programmer
Ric Niclas - Programmer
Rodrigo Passos - Sound Designer

Special thanks to 2D game artist Licínio Souza for assistance.
